name: Rotadisc
description:
Rotadisc is a fast paced game about destroying asteroids with discs. The catch is that your movement is linked to the discs you shoot so you'll have to think both quickly and carefully about every shot you take.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by SirMilkman, Barndles, and Skooka

Huge thanks to Waporwave and Droqen for staying up really late to playtest, to Tucker for helping with game design and to Timmy for helping make the sound effects sound nice.

Tools Used:
Code: Gamemaker Studio 2
Art: Aseprite
Music: Ableton
Sound Effects: sfxia
